meanings.definition: The process of introducing a cyanoethyl group into a compound.
meanings.sent1: During the cyanoethylation, the scientist carefully added the cyanoethyl group to the mixture.
meanings.sent2: Chemists use cyanoethylation to modify molecules for various purposes.
meanings.sent3: The cyanoethylation of the compound turned it into a colorful science experiment.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like the cyanoethylation process, adding a unique touch to everything she did.
meanings.sent5: The cyanoethylation transformed the plain compound into a masterpiece of chemistry.

meanings.definition: The act of adding a cyanoethyl group to a molecule.
meanings.sent1: The cyanoethylation of the molecule was a crucial step in the research project.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the effects of cyanoethylation on different types of molecules.
meanings.sent3: The cyanoethylation of the molecule seemed like a tiny puzzle piece fitting perfectly.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work was as precise as the cyanoethylation process.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of chemistry was evident in the delicate cyanoethylation of the molecule.
